VariableName: Special securities issued to National Small Savings Fund (NSSF)

Long_Description: Loans from Life Insurance Corporation of India (LIC) as on end-March

Long_Description: Loans from General Insurance Corporation of India (GIC) as on end-March

Long_Description: Loans from National Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development (NABARD) as at end-March

Loans from other institutions as on end-March

VariableName: Loans from banks and Financial Institutions
Long_Description: Loans from banks and Financial Institutions (FIs) as on end-March (Loans from banks and FIs = Loans from LIC + Loans from GIC + Loans from NABARD + Loans from SBI and other banks + Loans from NCDC + Loans from other institutions)
Total internal debt (Total internal debt = SDLs + Power bonds + Compensation and other bonds + Special securities issued to NSSF + WMA from RBI + Loans from banks and other FIs) as on end-March
